attributes.description: Évolution de la température moyenne par zone sur les dernières 24 heures
attributes.title: Température par zone (dernières 24h)
attributes.visState: {"title": "Temp\u00e9rature par zone (derni\u00e8res 24h)", "type": "line", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "avg", "params": {"field": "value", "customLabel": "Temp\u00e9rature moyenne"}, "schema": "metric"}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "date_histogram", "params": {"field": "@timestamp", "interval": "1h", "customLabel": "Heure"}, "schema": "segment"}, {"id": "3", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "params": {"field": "zone", "size": 9, "order": "desc", "orderBy": "1"}, "schema": "group"}], "params": {"type": "line", "grid": {"categoryLines": false}, "categoryAxes": [{"id": "CategoryAxis-1", "type": "category", "position": "bottom", "show": true, "title": {}}], "valueAxes": [{"id": "ValueAxis-1", "name": "LeftAxis-1", "type": "value", "position": "left", "show": true, "title": {"text": "Temp\u00e9rature (\u00b0C)"}}], "seriesParams": [{"show": true, "type": "line", "mode": "normal", "data": {"label": "Temp\u00e9rature moyenne", "id": "1"}, "valueAxis": "ValueAxis-1"}], "addTooltip": true, "addLegend": true, "legendPosition": "right", "times": [], "addTimeMarker": false}}

attributes.description: Heatmap montrant la distribution des alertes par zone et par heure
attributes.title: Heatmap des alertes par zone et heure
attributes.visState: {"title": "Heatmap des alertes par zone et heure", "type": "heatmap", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "count", "params": {}, "schema": "metric"}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "params": {"field": "zone", "size": 9, "order": "desc", "orderBy": "1"}, "schema": "segment"}, {"id": "3", "enabled": true, "type": "date_histogram", "params": {"field": "@timestamp", "interval": "1h"}, "schema": "group"}], "params": {"type": "heatmap", "addTooltip": true, "addLegend": true, "enableHover": true, "legendPosition": "right", "times": [], "colorsNumber": 4, "colorSchema": "Reds", "setColorRange": false, "percentageMode": false, "invertColors": false, "colorsRange": []}}

attributes.description: Métriques clés : nombre total de logs et capteurs actifs
attributes.title: KPI - Capteurs actifs et logs
attributes.visState: {"title": "KPI - Capteurs actifs et logs", "type": "metric", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "count", "params": {"customLabel": "Total Logs"}, "schema": "metric"}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "cardinality", "params": {"field": "sensor_id", "customLabel": "Capteurs actifs"}, "schema": "metric"}], "params": {"addTooltip": true, "addLegend": false, "type": "metric", "metric": {"percentageMode": false, "useRanges": false, "colorSchema": "Green to Red", "metricColorMode": "None", "colorsRange": [{"from": 0, "to": 10000}], "labels": {"show": true}, "invertColors": false, "style": {"bgFill": "#000", "bgColor": false, "labelColor": false, "subText": "", "fontSize": 60}}}}

attributes.description: Dashboard de monitoring pour le smart building avec température, alertes et métriques
attributes.title: IoT Smart Building - Dashboard Principal
